data.title: Ex-Milan coach Pioli set to sign for Al-Ittihad and meet Inter in August
data.meta_description: Multiple reports in Italy claim Stefano Pioli will sign a three-year contract with Al-Ittihad today, so he'll meet Inter next month in a friendly at the
data.text:
Multiple reports in Italy claim Stefano Pioli will sign a three-year contract with Al-Ittihad today, so he’ll meet Inter next month in a friendly at the U-Power Stadium in Monza.

Ex-Milan coach Pioli, a Serie A winner in 2021-22, is set to be appointed by Saudi Pro League side Al-Ittihad.

Sky Sport Italia and La Gazzetta dello Sport claim that the Parma-born tactician has practically reached full agreement with the Saudi team, so he’s expected to sign his contract today.

Ex-Milan coach Pioli set to sign for Al-Ittihad and meet Inter in August

This means the Italian tactician will coach some European stars such as Karim Benzema and N’Golo Kante.

Al-Ittihad have already parted company with Marcelo Gallardo, and Pioli is ready to replace the Argentinean.

Al-Ittihad won the domestic title in 2022-23 but finished fifth last season.

The Saudi team have already scheduled a friendly match with Inter on August 7 at the U-Power Stadium in Monza, so Pioli will soon meet his ex-city rivals, against whom he lost the last six meetings.
